name: Ring of Protection
description: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
trivia: This item is based on the Ring of Protection from Warcraft 3.
During pre-4.0beta2 in DotA, there were two types of Ring of Protection, providing 2 and 4 bonus armor respectively.

recentChanges.description: No longer builds into Orb of Corrosion
Now builds into Orb of Corrosion
